duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct vehicle inspections at various locations including dealerships, physical auctions, off-site locations, and consumer residences.
Complete vehicle condition inspections, repair/replacement estimates, and related documentation.
Identify and assess structural damage, frame condition, alignment of vehicle body panels, and detect missing parts and mechanical problems.
List inspected wholesale vehicles on ACV Auctions platform for bidding and purchasing.
Interface with customers to develop strong relationships and ensure customer satisfaction.
Travel to dealerships, auctions, and consumer homes to inspect and write condition reports, and list vehicles for auction.
Educate and share information on ACV available products and services with Territory Management and Business Development.
Stay informed about ACV products, service improvements, changing demands of customers, market conditions, and implement new business strategy.
Sign up independent dealerships as buyers to utilize ACV Auctions digital platform.

education_certification.credential: 1 - 3 years of experience in the automotive field (body, paint, and mechanical repair knowledge)
